resources.string: Password access loss warning (No GMS Core)
Your device does not have Google Mobile Services (GMS) Core. Password access may be restricted.
Your GMS Core is outdated. Please update it to continue using password management features.
To retain access to your saved passwords, you must manually migrate your data.
Password access may be restricted due to missing Google Mobile Services (GMS) Core.
Your GMS Core is outdated. Update now to continue using password management features.
Your device does not have Google Mobile Services (GMS), which may restrict password access.
Your Google Mobile Services (GMS) version is outdated. Update now to continue using password management.
A problem was detected with password access. Follow the steps to resolve the issue.
